name: Retro First Friday Collection #4
description:
Ziggurat started Retro First Friday in 2020 as a way to bring retro games into the digital age for modern players to enjoy. This bundle includes many of the classic titles released during Retro First Friday in 2021.

Games included in this bundle:
  • Zombie Dinos from Planet Zeltoid
  • MicroProse Soccer
  • Blue Max: Aces of the Great War
  • Das Boot: German U-Boat Simulation
  • Wetlands
  • 4th&Inches
  • Zephyr
  • Shadoworlds
  • Search for the Titanic
